definition: all walks of life/all social circles

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: The sky is blue and fields are green and laughter is the language of the world.
sentences.chinese: 藍天碧草之間笑聲成了世亖界通用的語言。

sentences.english: Heilongjiang river has the abundant water resources in boundary block, the engineering condition is superior.
sentences.chinese: 黑龍江干流界河段水力資源豐富，工程條件優越。

sentences.english: The concern has been raised recently over tick-borne infectious diseases in the field of infectious diseases in China.
sentences.chinese: 近來，蜱媒傳染病引起了國內傳染病界的重視。

sentences.english: The concept of cultural diasporic has been introduced to translation study recently.
sentences.chinese: 文化離散是近期在翻譯界提出的新概念。

sentences.english: How do you feel when you think of all the competing writers within the African-American contemporary novel industry?
sentences.chinese: 當想到當代非美小說界所有競爭作家時你是怎樣想的？

sentences.english: Wolf-grandam stories are in the air all aroud the world.
sentences.chinese: 狼外婆故事是廣泛流傳於世界各地的故事類型。

sentences.english: Chinas real estate market sector in between legal and illegal.
sentences.chinese: 中國的房地產市場界於合法和非法之間。

sentences.english: Call it the consumerization of IT.
sentences.chinese: IT界把它稱爲鼓勵促進消費。

sentences.english: Lookback is a term now widely used in blood banking circles.
sentences.chinese: 回溯是現在在血庫界廣泛使用的術語。

sentences.english: Oh, so they are just a new group of the model world.
sentences.chinese: 噢，那她們只是模特界的一個新興羣體。

sentences.english: Do you agree that most of the new seats in the 4th sector should be allocated to District Council members?
sentences.chinese: 是否贊成第四界別的新增議席，大部分分配給區議員？

sentences.english: Academic contends on the founding of Periodical Science is a rather fierce topic in the periodicals-related circle in China.
sentences.chinese: 期刊學是我國期刊界學術爭鳴比較激烈的研究領域。

sentences.english: The cost compensation for quasi-public goods has been the focus of attention in public finance circles.
sentences.chinese: 準公共產品的成本補償一直是財政界關注的一個問題。

sentences.english: Risk forecast and management is recently an interesting topic in the field of aids to navigation.
sentences.chinese: 風險預測及管理是國示航標界近年來頗爲關注的話題。

sentences.english: The uncertainties are assumed to be time-varying and norm-bounded.
sentences.chinese: 假設是隨時間變化的不確定性和範數有界。

sentences.english: I can always find a portion of the sphere that's bounded by it.
sentences.chinese: 總是可以找到球面的一部分以它爲界。

definition: the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
close circle/community/(esp.) the show business milieu
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
fully deserving, without any reservations (idiom); entirely worthy (of a title, honor etc)
